body.p:
Lawrenceburg Ky July 26th 1861
Gov Magoffin
Dear Sir
I can say that the facts are embodied in the petition as I am familiar with the case. He is an unfortunately ignorant man and remarkably poor.

I have the honor to be very
respectfully your obedient srt
J. S. Littlepage Jr
